thread.title: UNI's McMakin earns Missouri Valley defensive honor
thread.title_full: UNI's McMakin earns Missouri Valley defensive honor

author: Mark Woodley
title: UNI's McMakin earns Missouri Valley defensive honor
text:
UNI's McMakin earns Missouri Valley defensive honor Posted: Panthers Get the latest news and sports information about the University of Northern Iowa Panthers sports teams, including football, basketball, volleyball, baseball and softball. More >> Get the latest news and sports information about the University of Northern Iowa Panthers sports teams, including football, basketball, volleyball, baseball and softball. More >> CEDAR FALLS (KWWL) - 
UNI linebacker Brett McMakin has been named the Missouri Valley Defensive Player of the Week following his effort in the Panthers 31-28 loss at North Dakota State. 
McMakin picked up a game high 13 tackles, including a game high 3.5 tackles for loss. He also led the team with a pair of forced fumbles and an interception. 
The Panthers return home on Saturday for the first time in 5 weeks when they host Western Illinois. He also led the team with a pair of forced fumbles and an interception.The Panthers return home on Saturday for the first time in 5 weeks when they host Western Illinois. More >> Updated: Saturday, October 10 2015 10:23 PM EDT 2015-10-11 02:23:43 GMT After 5 seasons as the school's head football coach, Dan McCarney has been fired at North TexasThe dismissal comes after the Mean Green lost 66-7 against Portland State out of the NCAA's FCS division. McCarney, who led Iowa State's program until 2006, went 22-32 at North Texas. His best season came in 2013 when his team went 9-4 and won the Heart of Dallas Bowl.
